# Hazardous Waste Transport and Disposal Services

## Solicitation Overview

*   Solicitation Number: SPMD-22-PREON
*   Solicitation Title: Hazardous Waste Transport and Disposal Services
*   Contracting Entity: Public Works and Government Services Canada
*   Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada
*   End User Entity: Seized Property Management Directorate, Public Service and Procurement Canada

## Notice Overview

*   Notice Number: PW-23-01021710
*   Notice Publication Date: 2023-01-17
*   Notice Closing Date: 2023-02-22T14:00:00 (Expired)
*   Amendment Number: 4
*   Amendment Date: 2023-02-15
*   Expected Contract Start Date: None
*   Expected Contract End Date: None

## Services Requirements

The Government requires a contractor to provide hazardous waste disposal services on an "As and When" required basis. The services are to be performed in the Golden Horseshoe Region of Ontario (except for National Capital Region).

*   The contractor must have necessary permits, licenses, and authority to transport and dispose of hazardous waste in accordance with applicable laws and regulations.
*   The contractor is required to deliver the services in a safe and environmentally responsible manner.

## Bidding Process

*   Bidders must be approved Suppliers under the Hazardous Waste Supply Arrangement EW479-162880.
*   Bidders may submit a bid for one or multiple geographical regions of the Golden Horseshoe Region as outlined in the solicitation.
*   Multiple contracts may be awarded.

## Tender Documents

Tender documents can be downloaded from the [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/) website. The following documents are attached to this notice:

*   [Annex A - Statement of Work](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/17/f17c81d99a7e4a6482b301b19e00d1c7/lannexe_a_enonce_des_travaux.pdf)
*   [Annex B - Pricing](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/17/0f82fb2a5e8f6cd95
